queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n
MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true RETURN n
MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n

name: Show Enrollment Rights for Certificate Template

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Template...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:Enroll|AutoEnroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' return p

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Authority...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n.name
MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true    RETURN n

name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE    g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = treturn p
MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) RETURN n

name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE    g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usagreturn p

MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key UsageRETURN n

name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE    g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) return p

name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE   g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnrolreturn p

name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`User Specified SAN` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE    g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n
